product_name: Patagonia Hotline Tank Top - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Made with organic cotton and a touch of spandex, the women's Patagonia Hotline Tank Top offers support for yoga and light exercise with its built-in shelf bra. Organic cotton offers breathable comfort and easy care, and a touch of spandex provides light stretch. Internal shelf bra with brushed elastic provides soft support. Features cleanly finished seams and thin shoulder straps. Hip-length design offers complete torso coverage. The women's Patagonia Hotline Tank Top has a slim fit.
short_description: Made with organic cotton and a touch of spandex, the women's Patagonia Hotline Tank Top offers support for yoga and light exercise with its built-in shelf bra.
